form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/13/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS San Salvador El Salvador, C.A. FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) Junio 27, 1991. CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at San Salvador. E1 Salvador. NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX (Mo., Day, Yr.) F M I certify that on the above date I examined Zepeda Fuentes Julio Cesar Junio 1915 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON 1122253. Min. del Interior. San Salvador. GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancroid Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, Not Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma Inguinale Syphilis, Infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism See REMARKS EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm The chest x-rays show old rib fractures in the right Not Done side. They also show a slight pleural engorgement DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) of the right costophrenic angle. DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DATE READ Brito - Mejía Peña, June 25, 1991. SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally reliable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: TEST TYPE: VDRL ELISA DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY Lab. Menendez. Junio 25,91 Lab. Menendez. Junio 25,91. OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS The applicant suffered from a right side rib fracture due to a fall he had two years ago. This provoked a slight right pleural reaction which can be observed in the chest x-rays as an opaque zone in the right costophrenic angle. There are no active pulmonary lessions. APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and + authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. x Stand Junio 25,91 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE Dr. Eduardo A. Valdés Bolaños Eduardo Valdés Bolaños, M.D. DOCTOR EN MEDICINA Junio 25,91. J. V. 30, M. 866 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 *U.S. Government Printing Office:1989-250-926/00306 REVISED 2-88 DEPT. OF STATE
